    • RightPlantButtonClickedHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler RightPlantButtonClickedHandler()
      Event handler that gets text from search bar in compPlantsView, searches for plant from all loaded plants in model, and sends info gotten from compPlants to compPlantsView on button Click (Right Button Click).

    • listClickedHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler listClickedHandler()
      Event handler for listView in compPlantView. On list click, this handler finds the element clicked on, gets the coresponding information from CompPlants, and sends the gotten info to compPlantsView.
      Parameters:
      None -
      Returns:
      None

    • SaveButtonClickedHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler SaveButtonClickedHandler()
      Called from the Garden Editor View when the user clicks the save button. creates a copy of the current garden and if a unique name is given it will save the current garden as a unique entry in the list of saved gardens but if no name or the same name is given it will overwrite the loaded garden.
      Parameters:
      none -
      Returns:
      event - creates and saves copy garden.

    • getLoadGardenViewOnClickHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler getLoadGardenViewOnClickHandler()
      Sets the scene to the load menu when the Load Garden button is clicked on the home screen.
      Parameters:
      none -
      Returns:
      event - loads the view for the load screen

    • loadSelectedGardenHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler loadSelectedGardenHandler()
      Loads the garden picked by the user on the load menu. Uses the string highlighted in the ListView to find the garden in list of saved gardens. Once it has the garden it draws the plots in the garden and every plant in each plot in the Garden Editor
      Parameters:
      none -
      Returns:
      event - loads and displays the chosen garden.

    • deleteSelectedGardenHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler deleteSelectedGardenHandler()
      Deletes the garden selected by the user in the load menu. Uses the string from the listView to find the right garden, removes it from the arrayList of saved gardens, and then saves the arraylist to overwrite the old list.
      Parameters:
      none -
      Returns:
      event - deletes the selected garden

    • fromLoadToHome

      public javafx.event.EventHandler fromLoadToHome()
      Takes the user from the load menu to the home screen if they click the back button.
      Returns:
      event - sets the stage back to the home view.

    • generateReportHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler generateReportHandler()
      Handles the report generation when the generate report button is clicked in ReportView. This will send different pieces of information to reportView depending on the reportView checkBoxes.
      Parameters:
      None -
      Returns:
      None
